![Incheon Gyeongseo-dong Nokcheongja Kiln Site (Ïù∏Ï≤ú Í≤ΩÏÑúÎèô ÎÖπÏ≤≠Ïûê ÏöîÏßÄ)](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/1577563_image2_1.webp) ## Overview > The Nokcheongja (Green Celadon) Kiln Site was designated as Historic Site No. 211 in May 1970. On December 9, 1984, the 82.6 „é• of the protective film was restored here. In addition, the unearthed models consisted of bowls and plates, as well as porcelain and pots. The colors of the glaze are greenish brown and dark green, opaque and non-glossy, and there are spots on the surface, but this is the component of the glaze. It is believed to have come from the influence of the special structure of the kiln and the firing temperature. ## Intro | | | | - | - | |infocenter:|‚Ä¢ 1330 Travel Hotline: +82-2-1330
(Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese)
‚Ä¢ For more info: +82-32-440-4063| ## Detail Image ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/1577561_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/1577561_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/1577564_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/1577564_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512986_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512986_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512988_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512988_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512990_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512990_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512991_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512991_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512992_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512992_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512994_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512994_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512995_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/2512995_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-08-11-1660226065975/1577562_image2_1.webp](/2022-08-11-1660226065975/1577562_image2_1.webp) ## Contact - [‚òéÔ∏è+82-32-440-4063](tel:+82324404063) - [üè†www.seo.incheon.kr](http://www.seo.incheon.kr/open_content/tour/) ```googleMap latitude: 37.5582466915 longitude: 126.6562562094 title: 54, Doyoji-ro, Seo-gu, Incheon ``` ## Directions [Subway]
Incheon Station (Seoul Subway Line 1), Exit 1. Take Bus No. 306, 307, and get off at Jungheung S Class Apt. Bus Stop.
Transfer to Bus No. 42-2, and get off at Gyeongseo Farm Bus Stop.
Cross the street and go straight for about 400 meters and turn left. Walk for another 300 meters to Incheon Nokcheongja Kiln Site.

data.title: Incheon Gyeongseo-dong Nokcheongja Kiln Site (Ïù∏Ï≤ú Í≤ΩÏÑúÎèô ÎÖπÏ≤≠Ïûê ÏöîÏßÄ)
data.description: The Nokcheongja (Green Celadon) Kiln Site was designated as Historic Site No. 211 in May 1970. On December 9, 1984, the 82.6 „é• of the protective film was restored here. In addition, the unearthed models consisted of bowls and plates, as well as porcelain and pots. The colors of the glaze are greenish brown and dark green, opaque and non-glossy, and there are spots on the surface, but this is the component of the glaze. It is believed to have come from the influence of the special structure of the kiln and the firing temperature.
data.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Songdo Central Park (ÏÜ°ÎèÑ ÏÑºÌä∏Îü¥ÌååÌÅ¨)
dataList.description: The city of Songdo is a futuristic city with buildings like a piece of art. As the first seawater park in the country, Songdo Central Park provides visitors with various water sports including water taxi, canoe, and more. The landmark of Songdo also provides culture and arts throughout the park.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Socheongdo Island (ÏÜåÏ≤≠ÎèÑ)
dataList.description: Socheongdo Island is a small island located approximately 210 kilometers northwest of Incheon. The island is full of oddly formed rocks and visitors can enjoy sea fishing throughout the year. There are two fishing villages on the island with various sea life for fishing.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Sinteuri Park (Ïã†Ìä∏Î¶¨Í≥µÏõê)
dataList.description: The city of Bupyeong is surrounded by Gyeyangsan Mountain, Cheolmasan Mountain, and Manwolsan Mountain, which all form a basin-shaped area in the center. Bupyeong slowly began to establish itself as a city after the opening of Gyeongin railway and the U.S. Army base established right after the Korean War. Sinteuri Park in Bupyeong 4(sa)-dong neighborhood is equipped with outdoor recreational facilities including a soccer field, tennis court, badminton court, children's playground, walking trail, and water fountain, spanning an impressive 58,594 „é°. It also has a library with 1,500 seats, and a floor area of 7,869 „é°. The park serves as a main recreational area for Bupyeong residents.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Silmi Beach (Ïã§ÎØ∏Ìï¥ÏàòÏöïÏû•)
dataList.description: Silmi Beach, also known as Keunmuri Beach, is located on Muuido Island. The clean, sandy beach stretches out beautifully against the backdrop of a lush pine tree forest so dense that it does not let daylight in, even at midday. Facing the beach is Silmido Island, the location for the filming of Silmido (2003), a Korean movie based on the tragic story of Korean Special Ops Unit 684. The film set, however, was demolished after the shooting. The pathway to the island, which has no residents, can be shown during low tide. Therefore, visitors should be aware of the tidal times to know when they can cross back to the mainland.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Seonnyeo Rock (ÏÑ†ÎÖÄÎ∞îÏúÑ)
dataList.description:
Seonnyeo Rock is located near the Seoul metropolitan area, in the northern part of Yongyudo Island, past Masian Beach. The rock is named after the myth that a fairy came down on a rainbow to play on the beach. Artists come to recreate the scenery of the sharp rock against the ocean on their canvas as they listen to the waves crash. The beach is also popular among tourists at sunset, when the fading sun colors the sea around the rock.
On the other side is a small dock and old fishing boats. This beach is less crowded than Wangsan Beach or those in Eurwang-ri, making it the perfect spot for swimming and camping.
There is a pretty cafe up the hill from the rock and it is a great place for enjoying the ocean scenery with a cup of tea. On the other side of the cafe is a garden with pine trees, yet another beautiful spot to watch the sunset.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Seongmodo Island (ÏÑùÎ™®ÎèÑ)
dataList.description: Seongmodo Island, located 1.2 kilometers west of Ganghwado Island, is a popular destination for families and those looking for relaxation. The island has various mountains as well as a 41.8 kilometer coastal road.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Oktokki Space Center (Ïò•ÌÜ†ÎÅºÏö∞Ï£ºÏÑºÌÑ∞)
dataList.description: Oktokki Space Center is Korea's first aerosepace theme park. The center collects, preserves, and exhibits materials related to aerospace engineering to educate and promote to the public. It is open to visitors all year round, offering diverse activity programs and experience rides that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The center is especially well equipped with fun learning materials as well as educational programs to spark children's insterest in the field.
dataList.author: korea-tour
